website_summaries.verdict: This shirt, tie, and handkerchief set makes it easy for any man to get dressed stylishly for work or a special occasion.
pros: Comes in standard and more eccentric colors to appeal to any sense of style
Shirt is comfortable and made out of quality material that will stand the test of time
Shirt is decently thick and sturdy
cons: Shirt will likely require ironing after washing

customer_reviews.title: It had potential but...
customer_reviews.text: The way this product was received by me was simply unacceptable. The ties was bunched up in a plastic holder that made it so wrinkly it would have needed dry cleaned before wearing. Also, the tie had been pinned to the shirt so it had a noticeable hole in it. The shirt itself was actually dirty and it appeared that it had been worn and then possibly returned to the seller who then attempted to repackage it and send it. As for the shirt itself, it was a little thin but felt okay, but due to be dirty and the tie unusable I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Adam from Middletown

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistient Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought 2 of these shirts, both 18.5 neck, one fits like a dream, the other is so tight around my neck it felt more like a 17. They are also packaged with metal pins, which I never like because often times they leave rust stains. Nice shirts, but they could be packaged better and be more consistiently sized.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Quality & worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Grey looked snazzy, he loved the look with & without the tie. Good quality thickness of the shirt, able to wash out stains & starch it back to original easily. I appreciate when a shirt is of a quality that i feel that when my son wears it, I will not be throwing it away or donating it because it is not worth the quality to try to care for it... This is not the case. I do not feel like I am wasting my money. The quality is here. The tie is nice also.
customer_reviews.author: Kiristie Flores

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Small and Rust Stains
customer_reviews.text: Positives: -Great color -Stylish -The added necktie is a nice touch Negatives: -The arms and overall length were somewhat small for the size listed -There was a rust stain that developed from where one of the clothing-retention pins was placed. Even after using lemon juice with salt, as well as diluted ammonia, the rust stain has been minimized, but it is still present. Overall: -Whether is is "worth" the price is up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Limited uses. Awesome ties!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shirts. The colors are great I have 5 different ones. The thing about these shirts is their very thin opaque in lighter colors under the right lighting. Best uses for these shirts would be for layering. Either wear them with a sweater vest or a suit maybe just a good undershirt. They are thin comfy and plenty of room for us bigger people. Great for certain uses. If nothing else get them for the ties! Absolutely love the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on a shirt & tie!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best deal out there. They fit, are durable, and well-made for the price. I have several that are now well over 2 years old, worn and washed weekly, and I'm still wearing them. I haven't even lost a button. I just ordered 6 more. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Color was off,but nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: I am docking stars for the color quality of the shirt! I ordered this in peach for my husband and the color is gaudy! It is very far from a peach and more like an orange generic crayon! I am extremely disappointed in this and in a terrible time crunch so I really cannot do much about it in the next few days but deal lol Other than the color dissatisfaction,the shirt and tie itself seems to be fairly nice and well made,especially for the bargain of a price,so I would just suggest that you be confident in the color you’re ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a green shirt for an online meeting where we all represented our assigned Team colors. This was pretty inexpensive so I went for it, not expecting much. Once it arrived, the colors were better than I had hoped. After unpacking it, I tossed it into the dryer to remove the wrinkles — which wasn’t too successful I just ironed it and put it on. Fit well, and wore like I had hoped. Overall - not bad :-)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality = Price point
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, this shirt is spot on. If you understand a little dress shirt maintenance, then this shirt will last you for awhile. You will have the occasional random thread that needs to be snipped. Other than that, I have 3 of these now, and use them daily. The ties are a little short, but then again I didn't buy these for the ties. I wear a sweater vest, so the tie length doesn't really matter. I am very pleased with this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Xaq

customer_reviews.title: Little itchy
customer_reviews.text: Product is as I expected. I put that the neck is a little tight, but I have 15 neck and it says it's good for up to a 15 1/2, which might be true, but its a little tight. I might go a size up. The shirt itself is pretty itchy though, might just need to run it through the wash a few times, but we'll see. Looks good though. Fit's with my suit. I got the "charcoal" which kinda looks a little blue in my house. Could just be the lighting though. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Iwade5237

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and precise fitting Shirts With Tie and Hankie.
customer_reviews.text: It is great to have the matching tie and the hankie for fitting into the suit pocket. When I first ordered one of these, I thought that the tie was simply demonstrating what the tie looked like on the shirt. I see them displayed like this sometimes in stores. However, this shirt comes complete with tie and hankie, and the colors are great and the shirt fits precisely like it is supposed to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lynskey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and you can't see my undershirt through it.
customer_reviews.text: Shirt has met my expectations as far as a work shirt goes. I don't buy expensive shirts to wear under sweaters because the office is kept at the same temperature as the planet Pluto (Is it still a planet? - again? I'm not sure). I will say that the shirt is comfortable and you can't see my undershirt through it. Hey if you want the best quality ever made in a shirt then this isn't for you. This is for us practical guys who like to look good and won't pay $100 for a shirt that feels only slightly better than a cheapo.
customer_reviews.author: Menoc

customer_reviews.title: ... color coordinated with the tie and the tie is nice but the shirt material is thin and is not ...
customer_reviews.text: These shirts are color coordinated with the tie and the tie is nice but the shirt material is thin and is not of a good thread count. It's like a real cheap set of bed sheet fabric. I am glad they carried the larger sizes for my husband but I would be willing to pay $10 or so more for a better quality shirt. The collar got bubbles in the first time I washed and dried it on a low setting, the fabric is just not good quality. Milano Moda please note: heavy set men. . .they need that larger size but also quality in that larger size. The stars are for the tie. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Momsey

customer_reviews.title: Fits like most generic dress shirts, nice tie.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as well as any other dress shirt. I love the color, I got the rust colored shirt, and the tie matches the shIrt pretty well. My only complaint was that the clip holding the tie in place Made the tie really wrinkly. I was hesitant but after letting the tie hang for a week the wrinkles remained so I took an iron to it at low heat, took the wrinkles right out. Oh and the tie that came with the shirt is pretty wide, I'd say about 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: hovey

customer_reviews.title: You can never have too many dress shirts....
customer_reviews.text: Got these to supplement my job as a restaurant Manager at a hotel. The bonus is the price, especially with a free tie, which can mix and match with other shirts as well. When you have to wear a tie, the more the better..... Holds up great in the wash, only needs a quick touch up with light starch and an iron... But is inexpensive enough that you can splurge on dry cleaning when you spread yourself too thin on time. Yep, hotel life. You can work shifts 24-seven. Great fit, great quality. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was wrinkled. When ironing, noticed 100's of small holes next the side seams. You could see daylight through them. See pics. I would have returned it but I needed the shirt for a function. Certainly will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cash
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. Decent quality. The only problem is the button holes are a bit too tight, especially the top neck button if you wear a tie. Please note this is the button hole itself. I have neuropathy in my hands but I have never had this problem with other brand shirts. Make the button hole a bit larger and these shirts will be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Varnan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 58R suit and have to have the waist taken in 3 inches. This shirt fit perfectly and my shirt stays made it look good. My only complaint is the sleeves are a little long but that is because of my build, not the shirt. I've had it cleaned since wearing and it looks better than new,
customer_reviews.author: Warren Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: runs VERY short in the sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'10" guy with a stocky hockey-player build (hardly relevant but i'm Canadian and its genetic, sorry aboot that). Styling is simple and the pocket is perfectly deep for a larger cell phone. Color saturation is a little light but not faded-looking. Tie is sharp and nicely constructed. The length is a little short and the body fits great. Sleeves are WAY TOO SHORT! Waaaaaaayyyy too short as in mid-forearm short. I loathe having to roll up my sleeves as it's a little too casual for my office environment; luckily no one has noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Jace11

customer_reviews.title: Milano Mado Shirt with tie and square.Gold which actually is more like yellow mustard.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a previous review on a Burgundy set. This review is on the Gold" set. Package came surprised at the color gap but tried to work with it and after thinking I want to keep it I see a smudge on the collar. There are stray strings every where no attention to production I would guest speed is a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but Hard to iron
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent shirt and tie combo but when pressing the shirt there are areas that tend to bunch up and not sit flat on the press. Ironing with a hand iron may be easier, but the way the material is cut you tend to get material bunching in spots like the back of the shoulder, under the arms and the ends of the wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Proportionately way to big
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that fit was the neck. The shirt was to large the arms were to large and it smelt like chemicals. I also purchased a 17” neck for my son and shirt was proportionately the same as the 19.5” HUGE! Is a nice package deal if one size actually fit all.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Westlund

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely hated this shirt
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hated this shirt. If I could give it 0 stars I would. For starters, the material used to make this shirt is paper thin. The threads to hold on the buttons were not tight and the ends were already starting to unravel. I ordered a large and this shirt looked like a XXX-Large. I was baffled and thought maybe they sent the wrong size but nope, the tag said large. Surprisingly, the tie that came with the shirt seemed to be pretty high quality. Luckily, Amazon took the shirt/tie back without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Mixed media on the matching tie and pocket square
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking, I think. I asked the girl at Starbucks what she thought of the tie and she made a face. "Too much test pattern?" I said. "What's a test pattern?" she wanted to know. "What televisions did before you were born," I explained. And when did those interference and vertical hold buttons go away anyway? At any rate, the grownups at the office liked it so I suppose it's fine. I'll save the handkerchief to use when I wear this with a suit - which I'll probably do.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot S! Maggin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a new look
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to change his look and start dressing in dress shirts with his jeans (he's 14 - so much better than the other style options). He prefers black, but I loved the pop of color this added. The pocket square was a little stiff and hard to deal with, but an iron helps that on the lowest setting. It fits perfectly on him. The material seems to be good quality, and hasn't faded in three washes.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for a Dwight Schrute Costume (gold color)
customer_reviews.text: As I assume 90% of the people who also stumbled here searching for "The Office" and "Dwight Schrute Costume" want to know, this shirt tie combo is perfect! I used this for halloween and it's one of the best halloween costumes I've ever pulled off. The shirt isn't up to the standards I'd wear to work or in any capacity outside of a costume but it more than does the job for a night. It's thick enough that it doesn't feel/appear cheap, the collar holds up well, and the color seems to be as accurate as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: jvonnie

customer_reviews.title: Milano Moda Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirt with Matching Tie And Handkerchief
customer_reviews.text: Milano Moda Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirt with Matching Tie And Handkerchief I love the shirt. Feels great, Fits great. The quality of the shirt is very nice. Very comfortable shirt. I have no issues. I recommend this product line to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Roark

customer_reviews.title: The tie is nice...
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this shirt/tie combo, I know I as taking a chance since it was only $20. But this is REALLY cheap material and workmanship. It visually faded and began to fray after the first wash. Won't wear it a second time. I really like the tie however and it appears to be made a bit sturdier than the shirt. So basically I purchased a $20 purple tie.
customer_reviews.author: JavaJnky

customer_reviews.title: Color Faded in Splotches in First Dry Clean
customer_reviews.text: Took this shirt, brand new, to the dry cleaners before letting my husband wear it and, in the very first "wash," the color faded out in splotches all over this shirt. I bought several other colors of this exact shirt, all of them got dry cleaned at the same time, and this is the only shirt that the color washed out of. Very disappointing. Will see if they will accept a return in this shirt but I am not holding my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I received my order one day early and once again received the wrong size. I ordered a 15-15 1/2 and received a 16-16 1/2. I will not return this one like the last time. I really like the shirt and tie. It won't fit my boy friend. I am disappointed in Amazon this time. It makes it look like someone can't read the right size. Thank you Nancy Kranick 12/3/19
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kranick

customer_reviews.title: arms are so big i could make wings lol and ...
customer_reviews.text: arms are so big i could make wings lol and i weight 280 plus this body was so big i had to take up 4 inches and needed more. the pocket with my phone in it hung down to almost my belt and i am 6-2. i will never buy another live and learn, oh and now i remember another complaint the shirt came with a glue substance on the front couldnt get it to wash out even with spray and wash. the tie hide it but what if i wanted to take the tie off
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this shirt. It has a straight hem, which is unusual for a dress shirt. The tie is high quality, doesn't look quite like the one in the pic, but very nice. The fabric is thin, but not see-through...a plus here in Arizona. All in all a very nice shirt. Planning to purchase more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shirt, tie & pocket square. Very disappointed in the fit, had to return item & rush out to local store to find a new shirt for our son's wedding. Still wish I could have used this shirt combo because it's beautiful. Replacement shirt was same neck size as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Razorback Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt as a Christmas gift for my husband and he loved the quality and fit. He wore the shirt to watch night service at church and received so many compliments. He of course had to do a little ironing but that was no problem for him because he and I were completely satisfied with the set and the price was wonderful. I will definitely be ordering more shirts from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Lowman

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love the shirt, I believe the arms are a little short but they are just right, and the shirt is comfortable and real stylish. This is a very good shirt, now I am wearing it while writing this so don't know about after a wash but i love it. The great thing is the shirt is thin so I can wear in the summer which is somewhat of a challenge finding dress shirts for the summer. I have three colors and after washing the other two, they didn't shrink or the colors didn't fade so I am believing the same for this one. IF THEY GAVE ME A DISCOUNT I WOULD BUY TWO MORE.:)
customer_reviews.author: Jason W

customer_reviews.title: gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: This shirt and matching tie was a great gift for my son. His arms are 35 inches long and it fits him very well! I was so pleasantly surprised and so was he. We're used to returning shirts because the cuffs are just not long enough but this one was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Heitmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shirt and the tie matches perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt and the tie matches perfectly. This was a great price for everything that was included. I went back and bought several more of these shirts in different colors. My husband was pleased with this shirt and wears it once a week. It has held up very well to frequent wear and has not gotten worn down on the elbows or wrists like some of his shirts do.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lance

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: lets make this short and simple. Picture says it all. ordered the brand milano moda.... this is what what was sent to me. tried it on any ways since i took it out. Arm length was good but shirt was too long (maybe i can overcome that since im tucking it in anways). material feels poorly made i have a feeling that im going to have a neck rash once i wear it with the neckbutton on.
customer_reviews.author: aaron n

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective, but don't expect name brand quality.
customer_reviews.text: Thin material where undershirt is plainly visible. Shirt wrinkles easily but presses out easily as well. Tie is lower quality, and required pressing because it was wrinkled on delivery. Overall style seems mid 90s but is a good low cost solution for when a general appearance is required.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Update!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these because I like the nice colors. However, the pockets on these are a bit wide for my taste. As are the ties that comes with the shirts. Also one of the shirts has a crinkle on the back of the collar that will not iron out. This after only 2 times in the washer. The blue shirt faded after 2 washings.
customer_reviews.author: jjster2

customer_reviews.title: Wow they aren't even trying
customer_reviews.text: One of these things is not like the other. This company sent me a shirt from another company. I'm not wasting time waiting for another shirt, quality is cheap, it's too large and the stitching is terrible. You want a good shirt, then you are gonna need to spend a bit more money than this.
customer_reviews.author: Nidhoggr

customer_reviews.title: 2nd try and a fail
customer_reviews.text: I tried to give this shirt a second try and sized up. It fit just like the first one and the neck was not sized correctly nor the length. Very disappointing, because the shirt itself has great color. Would save your money and buy a different shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t try on shirt till today 11-15-17 unfortunately return window closed so I’m stuck with a shirt that the neck size is wrong ( too tight ) I guess I should’ve tried it on earlier. In the other hand neck size should’ve been cut correct. 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: junsterg

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for my son's homecoming dance. I am tired of spending $50 plus for shirts to match his date's dress every formal dance. This shirt is perfect. Fits correctly, the tie and pocket hanky a bonus. I washed, ironed with a mister bottle like I iron everything, no problems with the mentioned wrinkles. Yes the fabric is thin, but what do you expect for $20. ? I will purchase another for the winter formal. Pretty sure he will need another color to match another formal dress. :)
customer_reviews.author: luann

customer_reviews.title: The pocket can hold a 5th gen Kindle Fire! Seriously it is huge!
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the arms are very full. Also the pocket is the largest I've ever seen on a shirt. The tie comes out of the packaging super wrinkled but I was able to release all of the wrinkles with a clothing steamer. The print on the tie is just that, a print. It is not woven colors of thread. And yes, that is my Kindle Fire 5th Gen sitting in the pocket for reference of size.
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Neck is smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall the shirt quality is good, however, the neck is smaller than expected making it very tight around my neck. This makes buttoning the top button difficult for me so I subtracted 1 star. Next time I would buy one size larger than what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Purple is Wrinkle magnet
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, but purple wrinkled by noon. Dry cleaned to start the day, but couldn't figure out a way to make it work. I wear a tie every day to office for over a decade, so this is not normal. Maybe I just got a bad one. Blue one did not have same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not for a person who doesn’t have a BIG belly.
customer_reviews.text: The shirt itself is very thin. Almost see through. I got a 16/16.5 and I could not even button the top button. The shirt while tucked in was way over sized. Extremely baggy. Looked ridiculous. The tie was ok but terribly creased. A quick steaming took out the creases nicely. Sleeve length was perfect. I wouldn’t order again due to under sized neck and oversized body.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wore it once to an interview and got the job. It's a cheaper dress shirt (I'd compare them to the dress shirts one might acquire from Walmart in a box with the tie included). However it looks nice and once I ran the iron over it I also looked nice. I cannot complain for the price point though. Solid shirt, I already picked up another one in red.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo M.

customer_reviews.title: Color is accurate in image
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is more of a yellow - green. I was hoping maybe the image color was off in the product description and took a chance in ordering it. It's the same color in person, a weird green yellow.... which wouldn't really look good anywhere. The tie is cheap but I wasn't planning on keeping it. Fast shipping and item arrived packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Cocoplan

customer_reviews.title: Good Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a dress shirt just the right shade of pink and, based upon the online picture, I chose this one. The color was just perfect as was the fit - the tie and hanky were a bonus. I definitely would recommend the make of shirt to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: raeburn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking at a good prices
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish shirt that offers a great look for not costing too much. I can see myself buying several more in different colors to complete my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hallmann

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: There were several colors to choose from when trying to purchase a shirt. So much easier ordering online and having it shipped to house. Perfect buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great look for a formal dance!
customer_reviews.text: My son looked VERY handsome in it for his formal dance! He's in high school so color is everything. The color is exactly as shown in the picture. Description was exact. It is very stylish and the tie really set off this shirt! He received a lot of compliments from the ladies on the color! Very well made shirt, definitely not cheaply made! It came in on time as well which made it very stress free purchase! Will definitely order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Christy L Cox

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, great price, great fit and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Wow, love this amazon vendor, got a Big and Tall-like shirt at a normal shirt price...actually lower...and with a matching tie and hanky to boot. Will be ordering all my shirts here from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Pawlie

customer_reviews.title: Believe The Bad Reveiws
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the other negative reviews. The sleeves are much too short, definitely not the 34/35 length. The neck size was also smaller than standard, making the shirt unwearable. I thought the quality of the fabric seemed okay, though I was buying it for my teenage son for occasional where at extra-curricular school activities, so durability wasn't really an issue. I'll have to return this, not through Amazon but to the private company, apparently at my expense--so don't so it, go to a tried and trusted, more reliable clothing outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: It looked great, gave it to my bf to wear for ...
customer_reviews.text: It looked great, gave it to my bf to wear for a wedding and it was too baggy on him. He normally wears a small but this was just too large on him. Was disappointed because he had to wear an old shirt that didn't match my dress. Returning it wasn't worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlynne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material, handkerchief too small.
customer_reviews.text: For the record I must first state I did not do my own measurements on my torso, I went with medium for a 5'2 guy as a prediction that it would fit. It fit way bigger than I would like. The material is very thin regardless of the color, the shirt under will definitely stick out. The handkerchief isn't even big enough to stick out, it's very small compared to the pocket. I'd go ahead and just go to the store to get a shirt like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine M.

customer_reviews.title: Milano Moda Men's Long Sleeve dress shirt
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful shirt, but had to be taken in on the sides to fit my husband. The color didn't fade after washing it, but it did have to be ironed. [was definitely not wash and wear]
customer_reviews.author: joy keaton

customer_reviews.title: Nice but sizing is way off
customer_reviews.text: Bought hubby usual size and it was 2 sizes too big. Lol Was going to exchange but the color is a little odd. Burgandy brown. He was desiring a true Burgandy. Nice quality though. Maybe order a size down if interested.
customer_reviews.author: Libra Lady 78

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shirt and fits athletic build well
customer_reviews.text: Love the shirt and tie. Received multiple compliments when I wore this for a potential promotion meeting (interview). I'm 5ft 11 in 237lbs and long arms. So most XXL shirts barely fit my arms or neck. This shirt fits perfect! Great price and looks good too! I'm picking up more from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt,but runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and went a size up being the size below that he wears is getting to small for him. Well this need up being way to big and it swallowed him whole. The shirt is nice and liked that it came with a tie and matching handkerchief. I ended up giving this to my son an early Christmas gift. My husband is 5'9" 192lbs
customer_reviews.author: Ada Roth

customer_reviews.title: I'm a very satisfying customer
customer_reviews.text: The shirts for me are awesome and are affordable and very comfortable it speaks volumes I just purchased two more need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: Really great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the price. The tie is a little short but otherwise I'm happy with the durability and fit of the shirt and tie.
customer_reviews.author: Wally S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Really great value for the price. The tie is a little short but otherwise I'm happy with the durability and fit of the shirt and tie.
customer_reviews.author: Wally S

customer_reviews.title: Check size.
customer_reviews.text: I decided my husband needed. Color in his shirts the green is beautiful as well as the other colors I chose.check out the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wrong measurment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap wrong measurment shirt. I always buy a shirt with 18.5 x 36 x 37 (I am a big guy). I could not tie the nick button. The sleevs are 2" short. If you care about the accuricy of measurment, dont get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Hayel G.

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible for that price
customer_reviews.text: A bit chincy but not too bad for the bargain price. They arrived in excellent packaging and I am happy about that
customer_reviews.author: Bobby pudding

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY SHIRTS
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THREE SHIRTS. TWO OUT THREE SHIRTS HAD TO BE PITCH AFTER THE FIRST WASH DUE TO TEARS IN THE SHIRTS. THE TIES ARE GOOD. I WANTED TO BUY MORE SINCE THE PRICE WERE NICE. I WILL NOT.
customer_reviews.author: michael strong

customer_reviews.title: the shirts came on time and the ties are beautiful. I wish they made them a little longer ...
customer_reviews.text: The only area of these shirts that didn't quite fit was the length of the sleeves. My husband is really tall and has long arms. The sleeves weren't short enough to warrant a return and he's able to wear them without it being highly noticeable. Other than that, the shirts came on time and the ties are beautiful. I wish they made them a little longer for the larger shirts though...
customer_reviews.author: Holly Coppernoll

customer_reviews.title: and not like other cheaper shirts I have bought online
customer_reviews.text: Shirts are long, but fit in the shoulders, arms, and neck area perfectly. The shirt, tie, and handkerchief are actually decent quality, and not like other cheaper shirts I have bought online. I'd recommend these for anyone needing to add to their business professional wardrobe...great deal.
customer_reviews.author: CASEY E GEIMER

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for my daughter's wedding! My son is 6.6, 315lbs and the shirt fit perfect. it's not a tailored fit, but it worked. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: finish seams good, but color was off & the 18
customer_reviews.text: Arm length and neck size fit, finish seams good, but color was off & the 18.5 36/37 looks like it would fit someone 400lbs+. I'm 6'3" 200lbs and i'm swimming in this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like good fabric and tie feels good too
customer_reviews.text: Hubby hasn't worn it yet, but it feels like good fabric and tie feels good too. It isn't too thin. Good deal and so far as I can tell good material. Let's see how it holds up to washing.
customer_reviews.author: happilyapeterman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!  True to size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband and he loves it. Great quality and price! Fits great! Very true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Average quality for price. Some threads were coming out of the shirt. If the shirt wasn’t a one time use for a costume, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Zilligen

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few different colors for gifts, all colors were exactly as displayed on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Okodugba

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for teenage son for school science competitions. Its the perfect shade of purple for our school colors. The shirt is thick enough that its not see through, but not too thick. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Momma

customer_reviews.title: Solomon Grundy died on a Sunday...
customer_reviews.text: When I placed this order, it was estimated to arrive on a Sunday. I took that with a grain of salt, since the carrier was USPS. Imagine my surprise when my package was delivered on the Sunday, just like they said! I was very pleasantly surprised, and the shirt & tie are simply lovely. The only issue (as with any packaged shirt/tie combo) is getting the kinks out of the tie after being bunched in that little clip so long.
customer_reviews.author: WyldRobert

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency shirt
customer_reviews.text: I got these shirts a long time ago. I wore a few of them more than once, but the material is such junk that it all just falls apart. One thread from this tie completely ruins it, a pin hole in a shirt that never closes. I think between the 5 I bought, I wore each one once and a couple of them 2 or 3 times because I forgot to get my dry cleaning and didn't have anything else. I suspect they will be trash soon.
customer_reviews.author: LetsSingSomething

customer_reviews.title: The color looks totally different
customer_reviews.text: The silver color is NOT the same color/ shade from the picture. It looks to me like an old white shirt that needs to be bleached. I am returning this shirt and ordering the ash gray.... I hope that color is more accurate. I do like the tie.
customer_reviews.author: Dahls

customer_reviews.title: Always a good option
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. I bought a couple of these shirts over the years and they all look just as good in person as they do in the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Rell F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, Tie needs ironing
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fit perfectly. But don't expect to take it out of the package to wear. The shirt will need ironing, and the Tie will DEFINITELY need ironing on a low heat setting. The way the tie is packaged with a fake knot, put some serious kinks in the fabric, right in the most visible section of the tie! Other than that, a very nice combo!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: The Sizes are Way Off
customer_reviews.text: It's too large in the chest and arms. The collar size is too tight. I am an average build. Poor quality material. The tie and handkerchief are good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gittings

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for the price but it was a little thin you will need an undershirt
customer_reviews.author: CassiS

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Quick Review
customer_reviews.text: Easy and Quick Review: not bad but, thin material and many of the buttons have to be re-sewn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Seals

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with the cut
customer_reviews.text: If you're a big guy, this shirt is For you. I am an active guy who has a 16" neck and a 34"waist. This shirt fit me the way a Father's shirt fits his 12 year old son. I'm not happy with the cut. Something in the description should note that these shirts are designed for heavier built guys. The tie is stylish but the packaging made it wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Men's basic dress shirt - color ivory
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt and tie. The shirt washed and dried great, was not full of wrinkles, which made ironing it a breeze. Sleeves fit as expected as well as the length of shirt. The reason I gave this a 4 vs a 5 is the fabric is a bit transparent, you can see every little detail through the shirt. An undershirt has to be ironed due to the fact that you can see every wrinkle or flaw through the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: tsv

customer_reviews.title: Unwearable
customer_reviews.text: I try and save money anyway I can. These shirts were of such poor quality that I could not wear them even after professional pressing. I shop at JC Penny for work clothing often. These shirts are far worse than the clothing I buy even though the price is similar.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a back up shirt to keep in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tie and hankerchief combo, though the shirt was a bit odd. Not bad for a back up shirt to keep in the car, but certainly wouldn’t stand up to day to day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal. Both tie and shirt are good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. Both tie and shirt are good quality Y look sharp. Note: They seem to run a little small in the neck size. I normaill get a 17 1/2 but they didn't have it so I went with an 18 - 18 1/2 & fit correctly, Lucky for me but I think if I had gotten my normal size it would too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Fox

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fits perfectly on my husband, but too late when I noticed that there is a line across the back (like a thread snagged off). Too late to return because I already washed and ironed it. Also, when I opened the package, the shirt was not folded properly. It looked like it was a return item and then resold and shipped to me. I am not completely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned-did not like.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, Very this and had strings hanging from every end. Not fitted at all, almost as if they just cut a square piece of fabric and added sleeves and a collar. Was able to return for full refund for this give two stars instead of none.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: It was a return item sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as a used item. When I received it it was not folded properly and placed in a package, you could tell that it had been returned. Furthermore the handkerchief was missing.. Although the quality and the fit of the shirt was as expected. Help the company miss lead me to believe it was a new shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Parsley

customer_reviews.title: button fell off
customer_reviews.text: the only problem I have is the top button fell off as soon as I took out of the bag
customer_reviews.author: charles jamison

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt but it didn't fit as expected. This is always a gamble when you order clothes online. The color was great and so was the price. I really wish the shirt would have worked for me. The return was hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Shirt looks better than picture. The color of this shirt made it look like a more expensive shirt than it was. I am super happy about this shirt
customer_reviews.author: secondhomemaker

customer_reviews.title: Shirt has cheap fabric, necktie looks ugly. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Shirt has cheap fabric , necktie looks ugly . I did not wear it even once . Over sized .
customer_reviews.author: Babar Munir

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the fashion conscious Apple-Shaped male.
customer_reviews.text: Shirt looks GREAT in package; Tie is a very pleasant bonus, and also very fashionable. Price is right. But the cut it is very disproportionate: shoulders much too wide; pocket is like 6" lower than it should be; girth too large - much too much fabric. Although sleeves and neck correct.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyA

customer_reviews.title: Generous sizing and nice value
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is very nice quality for the price. The tie is a bit cheaply made but it serves the purpose. The shirt does run big, however so no worries on that part if you are unsure what size to order or if it's one of those Chinese knock offs. The color was nice and bright and the cotton was high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shelyn

product_meta.title: Milano Moda Men's Long Sleeve Dress Shirt With Matching Tie And Handkerchief SG21A
product_meta.description: Men's pointed collar long sleeve dress shirt with matching tie and handkerchief
feature_bullets: Men's pointed collar long sleeve dress shirt
